recipe.title: Aquavit Bloody Marys
ingredients: 1 quart tomato or tomato-vegetable juice such as V8, chilled
1/2 teaspoon hot sauce such as Tabasco
Garnish: lemon slices; small celery ribs
instructions: Stir together all ingredients with salt to taste in a pitcher. Serve over ice in 6 (12-ounce) highball glasses.
